related_equipments.name: Zoom stereomicroscope with diascopic illumination stand

related_materials.name: Glass Pasteur pipettes with rubber bulbs
24-well Clear TC-treated Multiple Well Plates Individually Wrapped Sterile

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"61db7","text":"Collect lungs from patent mice into 50ml Falcon tubes containing pre-warmed 37°C 1x DPBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"34bc0","text":"Remove lungs from PBS and place in large mortar or laboratory blender","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"100gk","text":"Place homogenised lung slurry into a flask (size of flask depends on how many lungs you have) and fill with diH2O or aquarium water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":111,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ngji","text":"Cover flask in aluminum foil and shine light horizontally across the opening of the flask for 1-2 hrs","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Exposing snails to miracidia for monomiracidium infections
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bm6cq","text":"Dilute miracidia so that one miracidium can easily be collected in ~3-5µl of water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Exposing snails to miracidia for regular life cycle maintenance
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8p5mm","text":"Place individual 5-8mm snails into 24-well culture plates and cover snails completely with 1x aquarium water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e1vpc","text":"Take a small aliquot of water from the top of the flask using a glass Pasteur pipette and place into a petri dish. Using a stereomicroscope, check for swimming miracidia","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Exposing snails to miracidia for regular life cycle maintenance
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5q73u","text":"After exposure, remove the snails carefully using featherweight forceps and put them in a new tank with food","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Exposing snails to miracidia for monomiracidium infections
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d3rjs","text":"Collected single miracidium using fresh 10µl pipette each collection and place in 24-well plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Exposing snails to miracidia for monomiracidium infections
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ls43","text":"After a plate is filled, check each well under a microscope to verify there is a single miracidium in each well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Exposing snails to miracidia for regular life cycle maintenance
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9ulq5","text":"Under a microscope, collect 15 miracidia with a glass Pasteur pipette per well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1uuth","text":"\nAlternatively (but less preferred) estimate the number of miracidia by counting 12-5µl aliquots in a petri dish. After collecting (shaking the tube in between) and placing the aliquots in the petri dish add 5µl of Lugol to each drop (this kills and stains the miracidia) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Exposing snails to miracidia for monomiracidium infections
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c79tp","text":"Place individual 5-8mm snails in the wells containing confirmed single miracidium and cover snails completely with 1x aquarium water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Exposing snails to miracidia for monomiracidium infections
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3m9qb","text":"Leave the plate overnight (inside incubator or room at 28°C)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Exposing snails to miracidia for monomiracidium infections
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6lomo","text":"The following day, transfer the snails to a new tank with food","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Exposing snails to miracidia for regular life cycle maintenance
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"eir6a","text":"Expose snails to miracidia for at least 3 hours (up to overnight)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
